name: Ducky Clicker 2
description:
Welcome to Ducky Clicker 2!

Ducky Clicker 2 is a clicker game that I made when I was bored and I am actively expanding on it just for fun.

FEATURES

  • Amazing story and overarching plot (only real sigma gigachads can handle the heartwarming ending without shedding a single tear)
  • Incredible Clicker Gameplay! So innovative and Great and even more Clicks!
  • Great soundtrack made by LargeMouse (it slaps trust me)
  • English and Polish dialogue options (not full game translation, though!)
  • Italy Man
  • ???

THANK YOU

For checking out this site and perhaps playing my crappy scratch game that I take a little bit too seriously!
